# 深度学习技术选型白皮书（2018 年）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shendu-xuexi-jishu-xuanxing-baipishu-2018-nian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shendu-xuexi-jishu-xuanxing-baipishu-2018-nian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shendu-xuexi-jishu-xuanxing-baipishu-2018-nian
shendu-xuexi-jishu-xuanxing-baipishu-2018-nian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shendu-xuexi-jishu-xuanxing-baipishu-erlingyiba-nian
shendu-xuexi-jishu-xuanxing-baipishu-erlingyiba-nian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
